articles.author: Leo Sands, Scott Nover
articles.title: Stephen Colbert uses his show to roast CBS in feud over FCC rules - The Washington Post
articles.description: The FCC chief blasted the Texas Democrat whose interview with Colbert was allegedly blocked by CBS, while claiming Americans trust “gas station sushi” more than the news media.
articles.content: Two days after CBS late-night host Stephen Colbert said he was barred from airing an interview with Texas state Rep. James Talarico (D) because of the networks legal concerns about flouting the FCCs … [+104 chars]

articles.author: Corky Siemaszko
articles.title: U2 releases Renee Good tribute song 'American Obituary' - NBC News
articles.description: Irish rockers U2 condemn ICE immigration raids with the surprise release of EP "Days of Ash," featuring a song for slain Minneapolis protester Renée Good, "American Obituary."
articles.content: Irish rockers U2 became the latest high-powered musical act to condemn the federal immigration raids with the surprise release Wednesday of a six-track EP that kicks off with a song for slain Minneap… [+2752 chars]

articles.author: Sabrina Eaton, cleveland.com
articles.title: Did you change your name when you got married? This proposed voting law could affect you - Cleveland.com
articles.description: The SAVE America Act has prompted warnings that its proof of citizenship rules could keep millions of Americans, particularly married women, from voting. All Ohio Republicans voted for it. Ohio Democrats condemned it.
articles.content: WASHINGTON - Congress is weighing legislation that would impose strict new proof-of-citizenship requirements to vote, a measure critics warn could prevent millions of eligible Americans from casting … [+9978 chars]
